preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from employee_dao ed inner join person_dao pd on ed.person_id = pd.id inner join email_dao_people edp on pd.id = edp.people_id inner join email_dao e on edp.emails_id = e.id inner join domain_dao dd on e.domain_id = dd.id inner join domain_dao_organizations ddo on dd.id = ddo.domains_id inner join organization_dao od on ddo.organizations_id = od.id where e.user = '${jacobAtS56NetUserName}' and dd.name = '{s56DomainName}' and od.id = ${s56OrgId};

column.name: department_id
column.valueComputed: (select dd.id from department_dao dd inner join organization_dao od on dd.organization_id = od.id where dd.name = '${s56ItDepartmentName}' and od.id = ${s56OrgId})

column.name: person_id
column.valueComputed: (select pd.id from person_dao pd inner join email_dao_people edp on pd.id = edp.people_id inner join email_dao e on edp.emails_id = e.id inner join domain_dao dd on e.domain_id = dd.id inner join domain_dao_organizations ddo on dd.id = ddo.domains_id inner join organization_dao od on ddo.organizations_id = od.id where e.user = '${jacobAtS56NetUserName}' and dd.name = '${s56DomainName}' and od.id = ${s56OrgId})
